{"id":1083634132,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month, 1Â week","timestamp":1698219179,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"35 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1083634132/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Insert Greatest Common Divisors in Linked List","memory":"30.4 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* insertGreatestCommonDivisors(ListNode* head) {\n        if(!head->next) return head;\n        ListNode* temp=head,*succ=head->next;\n        while(temp && succ) {\n            ListNode* gcd_node=new ListNode(gcd(temp->val,temp->next->val),succ);\n            temp->next=gcd_node;\n            temp=succ;\n            succ=succ->next;\n        }\n        return head;\n    }\n    int gcd(int a, int b) {\n        return b==0?a:gcd(b,a%b);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"insert-greatest-common-divisors-in-linked-list","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
